hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Musa that the Prophet said:"There is nothing on Earth that I swear an oath upon, and I see that something else is better, but I do that which is better

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ حَلَفَ عَلَى يَمِينٍ فَرَأَى غَيْرَهَا خَيْرًا مِنْهَا
chapter.eng-name: One Who Swears An Oath And Then Sees That Something Else Is Better
